Posts.Content: Garnersuz77 wrote: I was just dx with pulmonary sarcoidosis after a lot of tests and through process of elimination. Obviously I'm thrilled it isn't looking like lung mets as originally suspected but am now wondering what's next. I've got an appointment with a specialist in July but in the meantime would loveto hear about other's experiences. Have you had symptoms? Are you doing any form of treatment? Did your drs think it was related to your breast cancer in anyway or a fully independent dx? Thank you! Dx@41; Oncotype 9 Dx 11/2/2018, DCIS/IDC, Right, 3cm, Stage IIA, Grade 2, 1/4 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- (FISH) Radiation Therapy 4/11/2019 Surgery Lumpectomy: Right Hormonal Therapy Arimidex (anastrozole), Zoladex (goserelin) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Any Pulmonary Sarcoidosis sisters? Garnersuz77 djmammo
